job.title: Data Scientist-REMOTE
job.description: This AI Computer Software company located in Palo Alto, CA is looking to hire a sharp Data Science Engineer to join their growing companyThis Jobot Job is hosted by Taylor BuckelewAre you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.Salary $135,000 - $170,000 per yearA Bit About UsLocated in the beautiful Palo Alto, CA we are the leading provider of AI- powered software products that transform healthcare claims and payment operations. Our platform has enabled us to develop and deploy, at high speed, industry-specific products.We are looking to hire a strong Data Scientist, that will come in, develop and deploy scalable machine learning solutions to solve problems in the healthcare space.Why join us?We offer a comprehensive compensation package including but not limited to A competitive base salary ranging from $135K-$165K (DOE) + EQUITY! 401kBenefits Health, Dental, VisionCollaborative teamTrainingsPaid time offParties and team building eventsJob DetailsYou will be responsible for and MUST have most or ALL of the followingBachelor's of Master's in Computer Science or related fieldStrong business analysis skillsExperience in solving real-world business problems involving data-driven optimizationExperience with developing and deploying machine-learning systemsStrong experience with a programming language ( Python, SQL, R, etc.)Experience building data pipelinesIF INTERESTED, APPLY DIRECTLY HERE OR EMAIL ME A RESUME AT taylor.buckelew@jobot.comInterested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
